attributes.action: Demands the government take action, and boost our border controls, not to depleat to such an extend, that they are inept !
attributes.additional_details:
I demand the UK government take action within it's borders on the war on terror, and illegals, gaining access to the UK.
Boost the border staff and their powers, not reduce them to such, that they are virtually inept in their primary objective of keeping unwelcome. people flying in or sailing in without their passports, should be returned to their last destination. This applies to drug dealers too. confiscate the drugs, send them right back, let them take their chances with their suppliers. Why should the UK tax payers pay for the prison time, and all they claim once inside our borders!!!
Doing this would make our country more secure, and empty some of the prisons, more room then for home grown criminals and terrorists. All the UK decent people can see this is what is needed, for goodness sake, why can't the UK government ?
